title: Semi Senior Transcreation Project Manager
content:
Semi Senior Transcreation Project Manager
If you are looking for a new, rewarding challenge in transcreation project management, and are ready to share your enthusiasm, embrace the new (AI, wink wink) and play an active part within our highly collaborative, innovative Language & Culture team, this might be just the role for you. 
This position will work with Transcreation, Cultural Consultation, Copywriting and Voiceover workstreams, requiring high levels of organization, the ability to run multiple projects and language pairs simultaneously, proactive quality ownership, creative and critical thinking and confident communication.
You possess in-depth knowledge of project lifecycle from brief to delivery (including but not limited to quoting, briefing vendors, assigning tasks, performing quality checks/delivering/actioning feedback and amends requests/issuing POs, reporting project information and financials), with additional understanding of production elements that take part in the adaptation process.You will be ensuring seamless delivery of locally relevant, on-brand copy in multiple languages, while also helping us build team-wide solutions.
Ultimately, the role requires someone with strong project management skills, creativity, initiative, confident ownership, and commitment to deliver quality at scale in a dynamic, fun and collaborative team environment.
 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES 

Owning day-to-day transcreation, cultural consultation, copywriting and voice over projects, coordinating and managing delivery of multiple projects for different markets
Receiving and actioning briefs, defining costs, timings, and allocating tasks accordingly
Accountable for project budget, status, and reporting on these as required
Developing and maintaining flourishing internal and client relationships
Proactively supporting and participating in our L&C roadmap for solutions and actions 
Recruiting and onboarding for our database of worldwide talent 
Admin-related tasks such as updating trackers / managing POs and invoices from linguists

ESSENTIAL

+3 years of experience in Translation/Transcreation/Voice Over Project Management
Hands-on knowledge of language services workflows and best practice
Experience with localisation of marketing campaigns for multiple countries, media and channels
Sharp, precise communication skills 
Well organised, ability to multitask, attention to detail

DESIRED

Up to date / interest on recent AI developments in the fields of translation / copywriting / Voice Over
CAT tools / Project management software 
Knowledge of additional languages
Working awareness of digital production processes#LI-FC1 #LI-MP1 #LI-Hybrid
About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
